title: Graduate-Level Blended Learning Design and Implementation: A Science Education Project for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic pedagogical theory and experience in utilizing digital tools
context.additional_context: Focuses on pre-service teachers designing and implementing blended learning models applicable to actual science education settings. Provides integrated online-offline learning environments utilizing digital devices (laptops/tablets)

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the three core elements of blended learning (cohesion, media appropriateness, transactional distance) and apply them to science education projects
Learners can develop and implement a four-week project plan that balances online and offline activities
Learners can design learner-centered asynchronous activities (discussions, feedback, resource sharing) using digital tools (Google Classroom, Zoom, LMS)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
